mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, real_name, role, email, phone, classname FROM user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT id, username, real_name, role, email, phone, classname FROM user WHERE role = #{role} ORDER BY real_name
SELECT id, username, real_name, role, email, phone, classname FROM user WHERE role = 'STUDENT' AND classname = #{classname} ORDER BY real_name

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.real_name, u.role, u.email, u.phone, u.classname FROM user u JOIN student_course sc ON u.id = sc.student_id WHERE u.role = 'STUDENT' AND sc.course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY u.real_name
SELECT DISTINCT classname FROM user WHERE role = 'STUDENT' AND classname IS NOT NULL AND classname != '' ORDER BY classname
